source:
TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
An isle surveyor is searching for an assistant.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var>特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
ポイエテーン・オイコスの、浮島の調整士は協力者を探しているようだ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TODO_01<tab>Use the destructive magick concept on the rocky outcrop.
TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TODO_03<tab>Deliver the ore fragments to the isle surveyor.
target: TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TODO_03<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E91A201 /var>を浮島の調整士に渡す

TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TECHNICIAN04305_000_000<tab>やあ、あなた使い魔のようだけど、
ちょっと手を貸してくれない？

source: TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TECHNICIAN04305_000_001<tab>As I'm sure you are aware, the floating islands of Elpis were created to provide suitable habitats for our various creations.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TECHNICIAN04305_000_001<tab>知ってのとおり、このエルピスの浮島は、
あらゆる創造生物が暮らせるよう、人工的に創られたもの。

source: TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TECHNICIAN04305_000_002<tab>In order to maintain their respective environments, however, surveyors such as myself must make regular assessments of their aetherial composition.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TECHNICIAN04305_000_002<tab>環境を維持するために、私みたいな調整士が、
定期的にエーテルの調査を行っているの。

source: TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TECHNICIAN04305_000_003<tab>To that end, I was planning to take samples from the melanion habitat with my partner, but it seems he had an urgent engagement. Something about an unscheduled meeting with a member of the Convocation of Fourteen...
target:
TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TECHNICIAN04305_000_003<tab>いまから、相棒と一緒にメラニオンの生息地域に向かい、
調査のためのサンプルを採集しにいく予定だったんだけど……

source: TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TECHNICIAN04305_000_004<tab>Though I'm now faced with handling this rather grueling task alone, waiting until he returns is simply not an option. As I said, it's important to gather data at regular, specific intervals.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TECHNICIAN04305_000_004<tab>突然来訪した十四人委員の対応がどうとか言って、
相棒がどこかへ行ってしまったのよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TECHNICIAN04305_000_005<tab>And thus am I requesting your help. So, what say you? Would you be willing to accompany me in place of my partner?
target:
TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TECHNICIAN04305_000_005<tab>ひとりで採集を行うのは大変。
でも、後回しにしていたら、環境が変わってしまうわ。
そこで、あなたに仕事を手伝ってほしいの。

source: TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TECHNICIAN04305_000_006<tab>Many thanks! I'll be sure to reward you for your efforts.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TECHNICIAN04305_000_006<tab>助かるわ！
もちろん、報酬も払うわよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TECHNICIAN04305_000_007<tab>Please! I'll make it worth your while. The samples <var 1A 02 /var>must<var 1A 01 /var> be taken at the right time!
target:
TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TECHNICIAN04305_000_007<tab>そんなこと言わずに、どうかお願いよ。
もちろん、報酬は払うから。

source: TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TECHNICIAN04305_000_008<tab>Right, let's hurry along, then. We'll need to make our way to the south.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TECHNICIAN04305_000_008<tab>では、さっそく現地に向かいましょう。
「ゼピュロスの喝采」の南まで来てちょうだい。

source: TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TECHNICIAN04305_000_010<tab>The rocks in this area contain ores that can tell us about the environmental aether. We'll have to break them apart with destructive magicks to collect the necessary samples.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TECHNICIAN04305_000_010<tab>さて、採集したいサンプルはこの辺りの鉱石よ。
それを調べることで、浮島の環境エーテルの情報がわかるの。
ただ、そのためには、岩を魔法で破砕する必要があるのよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TECHNICIAN04305_000_011<tab>You may find that difficult with your inherent...limitations, but I have a little something to help with that.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TECHNICIAN04305_000_011<tab>エーテルの乏しい使い魔には、ちょっと難しいかもしれないから、
私が破砕魔法を込めたイデアを渡すわ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TECHNICIAN04305_000_012<tab>Here, use this concept crystal to shatter an outcrop of rock, then bring any ore fragments back to me.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TECHNICIAN04305_000_012<tab>あなたに頼みたいのは、<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EB61701 /var>に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E91A101 /var>」を使い、
「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E91A201 /var>」を拾い集めてくること。

source: TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TECHNICIAN04305_000_013<tab>Start in the east, if you would. I'll start working elsewhere, and we can meet back here.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TECHNICIAN04305_000_013<tab>それじゃあ、
あなたはここから少し東にある、<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EB61701 /var>をお願い。
私はほかの場所に向かうから、またここで落ち合いましょう。

source: TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TECHNICIAN04305_000_021<tab>Excellent. This should give me all the information I need. Let's head back, shall we?
target:
TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TECHNICIAN04305_000_021<tab>ありがとう！
これで採集は完了よ、ポイエテーン・オイコスに戻りましょう。

source: TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TECHNICIAN04305_000_030<tab>Thank you. Without your aid, I wouldn't have been able to properly observe how the introduction of melanioi has affected their habitat's aether.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TECHNICIAN04305_000_030<tab>あなたのおかげで相棒がいなくてもことが済んだわ。
今回の調査では、メラニオンの生息による、
辺りの環境エーテルの変化を調査したかったの。

source: TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TECHNICIAN04305_000_031<tab>It's important to keep careful track of the environments here to make any necessary adjustments.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TECHNICIAN04305_000_031<tab>このエルピスでは、研究対象が変われば、
周囲の環境の整備もしなければならない。

source: TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TECHNICIAN04305_000_032<tab>The terrain, the flora, everything that makes up the habitat must be meticulously controlled to fit each subject under observation.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TECHNICIAN04305_000_032<tab>そのため、定期的に地表や樹木の調査をして、
観察中の生命体に適した環境となるように整備しているのよ。

source: TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TECHNICIAN04305_000_033<tab>Though I applaud my partner's enthusiasm for learning at the foot of a Convocation member, we cannot neglect these fundamental─albeit tedious─facets of our work.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZH010_04305_TECHNICIAN04305_000_033<tab>来訪した十四人委員から学びを得ようと飛んでいった、
熱心な相棒の向上心も立派だけど……
この地道な作業も同じだけ大事なのよね。
